thread.title: Schuette rules Ann Arbor can't raise cigarette age to 21
thread.title_full: Schuette rules Ann Arbor can't raise cigarette age to 21

author: Associated Press
title: Schuette rules Ann Arbor can't raise cigarette age to 21
text:
Schuette rules Ann Arbor can't raise cigarette age to 21 Michigan's attorney general has ruled that Ann Arbor cannot ban the sale of tobacco to 18-, 19- and 20-year-olds. Post to Facebook Schuette rules Ann Arbor can't raise cigarette age to 21 Michigan's attorney general has ruled that Ann Arbor cannot ban the sale of tobacco to 18-, 19- and 20-year-olds.  //on.freep.com/2k5fZvJ   Schuette rules Ann Arbor can't raise cigarette age to 21 Associated Press 5:03   Michigan's attorney general has ruled that Ann Arbor cannot ban the sale of tobacco to 18-, 19- and 20-year-olds. (Photo: SvetaVo, Getty Images/iStockphoto) 
LANSING â€” Michigan's attorney general has ruled that Ann Arbor cannot ban the sale of tobacco to 18-, 19- and 20-year-olds. 
Bill Schuette issued an opinion Friday finding that the city's cigarette ordinance conflicts with a 1972 state law that set the "age of majority" at 18. 
He says the law pre-empts local rules. 
State Sen. Rick Jones, a Grand Ledge Republican, had asked for the attorney general's opinion on the Ann Arbor ordinance. Read or Share this story: http://on.freep.com/2k5fZvJ
